resources.string: The objective of the game is to get from the start to the goal (G). From the current numbered cell, you can move that exact number of cells horizontally or vertically in a straight line.
From the starting position, we can move vertically down 2 spots to the 4, or right 2 spots to the 3.

FAQ 

 Is it possible to move diagonally? 
 No, moves can only be made horizontally or vertically.

There is always a way to reach the goal position, no matter which position you reach. Restarts are not necessary. 

 You cannot move diagonally, only vertical or horizontal moves are allowed. 

 After solving each maze, you will be able to compare how many moves you made to the minimum number of moves possible, and can replay the game if you wish.

About

Gettysburg College.

Special Thanks to Todd Neller for supporting the project from start to finish!
Suppose we move down to the 4. There is only one legal (forced) move: right 4 cells to the 1.
From that 1, we can then move up 1 to the 2, left 1 to the 3, or down 1 to the 4.
